text: Lois Nettleton (August 16, 1927 â€“ January 18, 2008) was an American actress. She acted in television and movies and on stage. She was a semifinalist at the 1948 Miss America pageant. She acted in dozens of television shows, including Gunsmoke and Daniel Boone. Nettleton was born in Oak Park, Illinois. She died of lung cancer in California at age 80. title: Lois Nettleton
